name: Morgan Harlow
bio: Morgan Harlow is the author of Midwest Ritual Burning (2012, Eyewear Publishing). She was raised in Madison, Wisconsin, and earned a BA from the University of Wisconsin-Madison, where she studied English literature, journalism, and film. She earned an MFA at George Mason University.Her poems, fiction and other writing have appeared in Washington Square, Seneca Review, the Tusculum Review, The Moth, and elsewhere. Harlow’s commentary on Ray Bradbury’s work has been reprinted in Contemporary Literary Criticism (Gale, 2007) and Novels for Students (Gale, 2013).
